channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
ok, so i got pk planet source v3 and when i log in my hp is still 15 but normally on other servers it changes to 99 how can i fix that? and when i eat some food it don't heal anything can someone help?
thanks, halflive9

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

that code stands at my source… hmm…

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Halflive9 got the healing when eating. For Login Heal you can add this under public void initialize() {

currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

The case number is the food ID.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

For the food, remember the add the code for healing in client.java. If u want details, PM me.
Changes to 99? If you want 99 hp THAT much, go t your character file and change the skill levels to 99. Again, if u want details, PM me.
